home.descripcion: Focused on media relations, public affairs, and promotional marketing.

nuestraEmpresa.text1: At our consultancy, we combine experience, strategy, and commitment to build strong relationships between brands, the media, and society.
nuestraEmpresa.text2: We specialize in Strategic Communication, Media Relations, Public Affairs, and Promotional Marketing, offering close and ongoing support in every project.

slides.text: Formed by a team of professionals with proven experience and results in top-level international companies and organizations, focused on providing creative, value-added solutions tailored to each client.
We are a consultancy specialized in strategic communication, focused on Media Relations, Public Affairs, and Promotional Marketing.
Member of the Consultancy Committee of the Professional Council of Public Relations and the Association of Argentine Journalistic Entities (ADEPA).
We stand out for our active involvement in the services we provide and our continuous follow-up.

flexibilidad.descripcion: and continuous improvement in communication processes.

compromiso.descripcion: to understanding and integrating into our clients’ business.

consistencia.descripcion: with the defined strategy for each project.

MediaRelations.descripcion1: Building strong and transparent relationships with journalists and media outlets.
MediaRelations.descripcion2: Strategy for managing data and information shared with journalists and media.
MediaRelations.descripcion3: Content development, informational materials, and creation of key messages.
MediaRelations.descripcion4: Crisis management. Spokesperson training and development. Media Training.

PublicAffairs.descripcion1: Risk detection. Scenario analysis and influence mapping of key stakeholders.
PublicAffairs.descripcion2: Definition of policies, procedures, and action plans for each potential crisis scenario, aimed at preventing and effectively managing such situations.
PublicAffairs.descripcion3: Monitoring information and early warning of sensitive topics related to clients and their sectors.
PublicAffairs.descripcion4: Communication and relationship plans with the public sector, NGOs, and stakeholders.

StrategicMarketing.descripcion4: Comprehensive creation and production of corporate, cultural, sports, social, and institutional events.
StrategicMarketing.descripcion5: Organization of seminars, conferences, inaugurations, and press conferences.
StrategicMarketing.descripcion6: Design and construction of exhibition stands.
StrategicMarketing.descripcion7: Creation and production of corporate and training videos.
StrategicMarketing.descripcion8: Coordination and implementation of educational programs.

AnalysisAndProjectionOfVariables.descripcion1: Strategic consulting. Experience and professionalism in understanding key public and private actors.
AnalysisAndProjectionOfVariables.descripcion2: Smart interpretation of changing and highly competitive environments.
AnalysisAndProjectionOfVariables.descripcion3: Development of value-creating, tailor-made solutions for our clients.
AnalysisAndProjectionOfVariables.descripcion4: Planning feasible alternatives for stakeholders adapted to the context.
AnalysisAndProjectionOfVariables.descripcion5: Sectoral presentations and studies. Data collection and interpretation based on interactions within decision-making spheres.

DigitalStrategies.descripcion2: Planning and purchasing of online media.
DigitalStrategies.descripcion5: Creation and development of Fan Pages.
DigitalStrategies.descripcion6: Maintenance, content generation, and comment moderation for Fan Pages ('Turnkey' system).
DigitalStrategies.descripcion7: Planning and execution of actions on Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube.
DigitalStrategies.descripcion8: Planning and purchasing of SEM (Search Engine Marketing) actions.

CorporateImage.descripcion1: Strategic definition of corporate image objectives.
CorporateImage.descripcion3: Identification of attributes associated with the existing brand.
CorporateImage.descripcion4: Institutional criteria: International vs. National. Global brand.
CorporateImage.descripcion6: Diagnosis and research: Focus Groups, in-depth interviews, qualitative and quantitative studies.

FabianFalco.bio: Developed comprehensive communication and relationship campaigns for politicians, media outlets, institutions, and companies. Served as Chairman of the Board of El Cronista Comercial S.A. for two years. For over eight years, he was Director of Communication and External Relations at Repsol YPF for Argentina, Brazil, and Bolivia. Between 1993 and 2001, he was Director of External Communications and Marketing at Aguas Argentinas (Suez Group). In 2007, he received the Konex Platinum Award as the best Institutional Communication figure of the decade.

GenovevaSposetti.bio: Bachelor’s Degree in Public Relations (UADE) and Postgraduate in Corporate Affairs Management (UCA). Worked at consulting firms MDG Comunicación e Imagen and Mauro y Estomba.

SusanaMaggiorini.bio: Bachelor’s Degree in Public and Institutional Relations and Postgraduate in Corporate Affairs Management (UCA). Formerly worked at Consultores del Plata.

NicolasCastano.bio: Bachelor’s Degree in Public Relations (UADE), with a specialization in International Relations and Government. Postgraduate in Corporate Affairs Management (UCA). Over 15 years of experience in communication and corporate affairs.

DamianJuarez.bio: Professor, journalist, and political columnist. Co-director of the radio show 'Huevos Revueltos' (Radio con Vos). Political editor at Crónica newspaper. Former Editor-in-Chief at Télam and producer at 'A Dos Voces' (TN).

GonzaloDiaz.bio: Lawyer (UNR), specialized in Labor and Parliamentary Law. Extensive experience in public and parliamentary affairs across both public and private sectors.

EnzoPotesPouyanne.bio: Bachelor’s Degree in Public and Institutional Relations (USAL). Master’s in Political Communication and Electoral Campaigns (UCM, Madrid).

JoaquinVilaplana.bio: Bachelor’s Degree in Social Communication (UBA) with experience in writing, editing, and coordinating internal communication materials.

ArianaLopezPasquare.bio: Bachelor’s Degree in Communication Sciences (UADE) with experience in writing (Clarín) and political community management.

EugeniaSilvestre.bio: Bachelor’s Degree in Public and Institutional Relations (UADE) with previous experience in consulting as an account assistant.

FaustoMendozaJoy.bio: Journalist (Tea & Deportea) and Bachelor’s Degree in Communication Sciences (UADE), with experience across various mass media.
